description.narrative:
Project Impact: Stakeholders - Through this investment, IFC anticipates the project will increase ABBank's ability to provide access to financial products and services to MSMEs and SMEs including women-owned SMEs. The project may also support improvements in affordability of loans in Vietnam. Potential advisory component may improve skills related to SME banking and banking on women.
Market Impact: Inclusiveness - The current MSMSE Finance Gap in Vietnam is 11 percent of GDP. IFC anticipates that the project will increase access to financial products and services for under-served groups including women entrepreneurs, which in turn is expected to improve financial inclusion, employment and reduce poverty in Vietnam. Competitiveness - Driven by demonstration effect, as this would be the second banking-on-women project in the country, it could bring other banks to this space and improve the product offering for women SMEs and SMEs in general; thus, closing the financing gap.
